text: Don't Swallow My Heart, Alligator Girl! () is a 2017 Brazilian drama film directed by Felipe Bragança. It was screened in the World Cinema Dramatic Competition section of the 2017 Sundance Film Festival. ==Cast== * Cauã Reymond as Fernando * Mario Verón as Alberto * Leopoldo Pacheco as César * Adeli Benitez as Basano ==References== ==External links== * Category:2017 films Category:2017 drama films Category:Brazilian films Category:Brazilian drama films Category:Portuguese-language films
title: Don't Swallow My Heart, Alligator Girl!
